Package generation

Interface Order

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultOrder, StateGenerating
public interface Order
An order describes functionality needed to order a maze from the maze factory. It allows for asynchronous production with a mechanism to deliver a MazeConfiguration.
Author:
Peter Kemper

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    Order.Builder
    Lists all maze generation algorithms that are supported by the maze factory (Eller needs to be implemented for P2)

  • Method Details

    • getSkillLevel

      int getSkillLevel()
      Gives the required skill level, range of values 0,1,2,...,15.
      Returns:
      the skill level or size of maze to be generated in response to an order

    • getBuilder

      Order.Builder getBuilder()
      Gives the requested builder algorithm, possible values are listed in the Builder enum type.
      Returns:
      the builder algorithm that is expected to be used for building the maze

    • isPerfect

      boolean isPerfect()
      Describes if the ordered maze should be perfect, i.e. there are no loops and no isolated areas, which also implies that there are no rooms as rooms can imply loops
      Returns:
      true if a perfect maze is wanted, false otherwise

    • getSeed

      int getSeed()
      Gives the seed that is used for the random number generator used during the maze generation.
      Returns:
      the current setting for the seed value of the random number generator

    • deliver

      void deliver​(Maze mazeConfig)
      Delivers the produced maze. This method is called by the factory to provide the resulting maze as a MazeConfiguration. It is a call back function that is called some time later in response to a client's call of the order method.
      Parameters:
      mazeConfig - is the maze that is delivered in response to an order

    • updateProgress

      void updateProgress​(int percentage)
      Provides an update on the progress being made on the maze production. This method is called occasionally during production, there is no guarantee on particular values. Percentage will be delivered in monotonously increasing order, the last call is with a value of 100 after delivery of product.
      Parameters:
      percentage - of job completion
